meanings.sent1: I need to buy new ginch.

meanings.sent5: The elastic on his ginch was too tight.

meanings.sent1: He tried to ginch the toy from his brother.

meanings.sent4: The magician seemed to ginch the coin out of thin air.

meanings.sent1: Can I have a ginch of your ice cream?
